name: Plugin Name:            Fewcents
author: Fewcents

sections.description:
MORE PAYMENTS FROM EVERY PAGEVIEW

Fewcents is a monetization solution for publishers to generate incremental reader revenue from their global audience. We help publishers and creators identify never-subscribers and increase their propensity to subscribe through a-la-carte payments.

OUR PLUGINS

Plugin to easily get started on reader revenue. There are 2 modes of the plugin:
1. Fewcents Paywall, a pay-per-content solution to unbundle quality content, manage digital rights, and monetize never-subscribers without cannibalizing subscription revenue.

Learn More: https://vimeo.com/632669454

  1. Fewcents Tipjar, a voluntary contributions solution to enable audiences show their support for your work with tips, independent of ads revenue.

Learn More: https://vimeo.com/613471553

WHY FEWCENTS

Easy-to-Use

  • Simply toggle between Paywall and Tipjar in 1-click
  • Customize the look and feel of your Fewcents Paywall or Tipjar to match your site branding

Monetize Multiple Formats

  • Works with text, audio, video, and downloadable content
  • Pre-built integrations for video players – Dailymotion, Vimeo, Brightcove, JW Player, HTML5

Revenue from Global Audience

  • Supports 50+ currencies and all local payment methods across 70+ countries

Granular Control

  • Define pricing at an article level, or section/category level
  • Define pricing for specific geographies (states, countries) depending on your site traffic
  • Define time-bound digital rights

First-Party Data Analytics

  • Identify who is paying, how much, for what content, and from where
  • Gauge the right audience-content-price mix

Easy Payouts

  • At the end of every month, your earnings are paid out in your home currency

Audience Experience

  • Secure payments through Stripe, Rapyd, Paypal
  • One-click checkout with no friction
